question: How much money does the Madrasah in South Africa cost per student? What ruling are there as regarding how to pray dua qunoot in fajr salat? Can we make it for the palestinians
answer:
QUESTION
Are classes taught in arabic? Is there any muhadiths in the world today that know as many hadith as the early muhadiths? What did the Hanafi ulama that said shrimp to be halal use as their argument against the original opinion of Abu Hanifa RA who said it to be haram, is there evidence to any of this in Quran and Hadith that may be relevant? Is Mahmud Abbas acting according and within the bounds of the Shariah? Is the group hamas correct to reject the peace plan and continue to fight the kufr? What ruling are there as regarding how to pray dua qunoot in fajr salat? Can we make it for the palestinians and if so how do we do that according to hanafi? does it have to be in arabic? do we hold the hands up?
ANSWER

1. The annual fee is R5400 (approximately $750). This fee includes education, boarding and meals.%0D%0A%0D%0A2. Classes are conducted initially in English and thereafter in Urdu. However, most of the books used in the syllabus are in Arabic.%0D%0A%0D%0A3. We do not know of any such Muhadditheen at present in the world.%0D%0A%0D%0A4. It is merely a difference of classification. Those who classified shrimp as a fish regard it as Halaal whilst others who classify it as a non-fish regard such sea creatures as Makrooh.%0D%0A%0D%0A5. He is a political role player. We are unable to make a judgment as far as his political stance is concerned.%0D%0A%0D%0A6. Yes, they are correct in rejecting the so-called peace plan that virtually deprives the Muslims of their own land and freedom. The peace plan is a massive sham.%0D%0A%0D%0A7. According to the Hanafi Madhab, Qunoot may not be recited tafter the Ruku of the second Rakaat of Fajr Salaat only when the Ummah is afflicted with some calamity. The Du?aa should be in Arabic.
